title: Low priority queue nonsense
body: Ever since patch 5.1 i've been getting disconnected, connection interrupted, bugsplat, (sometimes the game won't even start loading after champ select is finished and i have to restart client) etc. in about 50% of my games and i have had little to no trouble with these things since pre 5.1 my computer specs have not been changed in the slightest, i've talked to my isp and even had a technician sent out to test the phone lines, changed my splitter and nothing and ofcoarse ive recently been put into a low priority queue which makes matchmaking that little bit more annoying was just wondering if there may be something i have overlooked or if anyone is having this problem

replies.body: why play lol in the first place if you know of these reoccurring problems, google your problem, send a support ticket, and if it's for testing purposes play a bot game. Don't inconvenience other people.

> [{quoted}](name=Wumachine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NfvlBcl3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-24T16:09:03.856+0000)
>
> why play lol in the first place if you know of these reoccurring problems, google your problem, send a support ticket, and if it's for testing purposes play a bot game. Don't inconvenience other people.

i really don't understand where you are coming from, there is 0 consistency to which my problems are occuring and i am yet to encouter a fault on my behalf

"Ever since patch 5.1 i've been getting disconnected, connection interrupted, bugsplat, (sometimes the game won't even start loading after champ select is finished and i have to restart client) etc. in about 50% of my games"

Assuming you keep playing......pls
nope just rito being %%%% it has happened to me a few friends and its all over the forums

> [{quoted}](name=jigglejigglwoosh,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NfvlBcl3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-24T05:05:39.153+0000)
>
